name: Magnetism (Jaylin Grierson, Daniel Fraser, iezons, Marty_McDie, Echo)
name_original: Magnetism (Jaylin Grierson, Daniel Fraser, iezons, Marty_McDie, Echo)
description:
Magnetism is a top-down 3D puzzle game with a focus on physics-based puzzle solving. Throughout the game the player uses magnets to move objects and solve puzzles. The player will explore different areas using the magnets to push and pull metal objects in the environment. Depending on their size objects will react differently when hit with a magnet. Smaller objects will be moved around while larger objects will move the player instead. 

Do you have what it takes to reach the bottom level of the mines and collect all the gems?
